timeline.message:
Improve ShuntCompensatorAdder implementation

Signed-off-by: Mathieu BAGUE <mathieu.bague@rte-france.com>

timeline.bodyText:
We can use Supplier<String> attribute as following :
shuntCompensator.notifyUpdate(() -> getAttributeName(index, "b"), oldValue, this.b);
timeline.author: tadam50

timeline.bodyText:
We can use Supplier<String> attribute as following :
shuntCompensator.notifyUpdate(() -> getAttributeName(index, "g"), oldValue, this.g);
timeline.author: tadam50

timeline.bodyText: Make it fluent, can be usefull ?
timeline.author: tadam50

timeline.message:
Fix shunt implementation

Signed-off-by: Mathieu BAGUE <mathieu.bague@rte-france.com>
